* "The Fault in Our Stars" is a heart-wrenching love story about two teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. It's based on the bestselling novel by John Green and features outstanding performances from Shailene Woodley and Ansel Elgort. Both movies are sure to leave you feeling emotionally moved and inspired!
